attributes.action: Do An Interview With Russell Brand
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Russell Brand, one of the UK's top and most known comedians of the 21st century has requested an interview with Britains new Prime Minister Gordon Brown. Not only will this be of great use for the public as we will find out many new ideas and policies of the new Prime Minister, it will also be useful to the Prime Minister's reputation to be seen with one of the UK's true comic greats.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
